## Vector3.Distance() method

Returns the distance between the vectors "value1" and "value2"

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Distance(value1: ReadOnlyVector3, value2: ReadOnlyVector3): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value1 | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the first operand |
|  value2 | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the second operand |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

the distance
